shopInfo.address: Xóm 2, Liên Phương, Thường Tín, Hà Nội

banner.title: MOONCAKES YOU CAN'T MISS
banner.desc: The national brand is the top choice of consumers

section1.desc1: Authentic mooncakes with perfect quality and specifications

reason.title: Reasons
reason.desc1: We guarantee that we deliver authentic Mooncakes with perfect quality and specifications.
reason.desc2: Respecting the meaning of the Mid-Autumn Festival, we continually create and invest in new products every year with the best quality and designs, contributing to a meaningful Mid-Autumn Festival with rich Vietnamese identity.

saleItems.title: HOT OFFERS
saleItems.desc: Not too fancy, but our mooncakes are simple and special, making many generations fall in love.

about.desc01: We sincerely thank you for your continuous support and trust in our products!
about.desc02: This Mid-Autumn Festival, the most impressive product from Kinh Đô is the high-end Trăng Vàng collection. With the precious meaning of familial bonds and relationships, Kinh Đô launches a new collection of Trăng Vàng mooncakes, including Trăng Vàng Kim Cương, Trăng Vàng Bạch Kim, Trăng Vàng Hoàng Kim, and Trăng Vàng Hồng Ngọc, with luxury ingredients like Japanese Scallop XO sauce, Huỳnh Đế Crab, Bách Hoa Shrimp, and Tứ Quý Roasted Chicken.
about.desc03: We are also one of the brands of mooncakes that consumers have voted as high-quality Vietnamese products. This success is thanks to the continuous efforts of our management team, staff, and bakers.
about.desc04: Above all, we would like to express our deepest thanks to our customers for supporting our brand over the years. We believe that with our continuous efforts and the favor of our customers, we will continue to grow stronger to serve consumers even better.
about.desc05: We aim to become the number one mooncake brand in Vietnam, with a commitment to providing high-end, safe, and creative products to satisfy all customers.
about.desc06: Our mission is to constantly innovate, improve quality, and provide exceptional experiences for customers with every product, through familial love and connections.
about.desc07: We believe that success comes not only from providing quality products but also from the dedication in every step of production, packaging, and customer service. Every mooncake we create is a work of art, containing not just flavor, but also love and respect for our customers.
about.desc08: In the future, we will continuously develop and upgrade our production process, applying modern technology to provide the best experiences for consumers. At the same time, we commit to protecting the environment, optimizing resource use, and always supporting sustainable development.
about.desc09: Every product is not just a meaningful gift during Mid-Autumn Festival but also a symbol of love and connection that we aim to convey to every Vietnamese family. With a clear vision and strong mission, we hope to bring long-term value, creating trust and love from consumers.
about.desc10: Not too fancy, mooncakes with a rustic and distinctive feature that have captivated generations of fans.
